description:
Sign up for a Plex Pass : http://lon.tv/plexpass (compensated affiliate link) - A Plex Server with transcoding capabilities doesn't have to break the bank. In this video we test a sub $150 Intel N100 based Mini PC to see how well it handles Plex serving including hardware transcoding. Find the Mini PC here:  https://lon.tv/ti6cb and see more Plex here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIvqJPAmMooCKOHieLdi3I7o

Links:
My initial hardware transcode video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2PyRpYb66-Y
Intel Quicksync info : https://lon.tv/quicksyncwiki

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
01:02 - Windows vs Linux
02:00 - Hardware Transcding
03:53 - Downloading & Installing
07:21 - Transcoder Settings
08:40 - Transcoding Examples
12:14 - Conclusion

title: Plex Server on the Cheap? Intel N100 Mini PCs are a Great Choice
